description.@en: A foe is wracked with painful thorns, which grows from their insides-out.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, your foe immediately suffers [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage. In addition, they suffer a -10 Base Chance to all Skill Tests for the Duration of the spell. Your foe can successfully Resist with a Resolve Test when this spell is cast or at the beginning of their subsequent Turns.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the affected suffers a -20 Base Chance instead.

criticalFailure.@en: Heartless worm, you shall lay prostrated before your enemies! For the spellâ€™s Duration, you are held in-place, rendered Helpless and Prone on the ground by thorny vines.

system.distance: Any one person you can see
